data.eml:eml: Three new species of the genus Quedius (subgenus Microsaurus) from China (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini: Quediina)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cai, Yan-Peng, Zhao, Zong-Yi, Zhou, Hong-Zhang (2015): Three new species of the genus Quedius (subgenus Microsaurus) from China (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini: Quediina). Zootaxa 3973 (3): 567-578, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3973.3.10
